thread.title: Indian Railways’ IRCTC website down for 45 minutes; e-ticketing service unavailable
thread.title_full: Indian Railways’ IRCTC website down for 45 minutes; e-ticketing service unavailable | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Indian Railways’ IRCTC website down for 45 minutes; e-ticketing service unavailable
text:
Other Articles WikiLeaks accuses US of spying on Japan, tapping 'conversations' Letters to the editor Govt promoting RSS ideology: Rahul Gandhi Indian Railways website, IRCTC, was giving a downtime message tonight and has still not come online, creating inconvenience for travellers.
Any one logging in was unable to transact any business for quite some time.
Indian Railways notice had this to say about its service being down, ‘Due to maintenance activity, e-ticketing service will not be available. Inconvenience is deeply regretted’.
The website was still to come online even after 45 minutes.
 31, 2015 10:59 pm
